## Loading the data

```{r, include=FALSE}
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
committees_concise <- select(committees, -cmte_dsgn, -cmte_name, -tres_name,-cmte_st2, -cmte_city,-connected_org_name, -cmte_zip, -cmte_st1)
committees_concise

```

```{r}
candidate_detail <-  candidates %>%
  select(cand_id,cand_name,cand_party_affiliation,cand_election_yr,cand_office_state)

candidate_detail
```

```{r}
my_contributions <- contributions %>%
  select("cmte_id", "name", "state", "transaction_amt", "other_id", "cand_id")
```
